1.content:
It was the birthday for one lucky girl by the name of Jenny Smith. She woke up this morning with a huge smile on her face as she got out of bed with a smile on her face. She got dressed in her cute yellow sundress and pink skirt. She heard the doorbell ring downstairs. She opened it only to find a small box before her. She looked around not seeing a single soul around. She picked the box up and opened it only to find a small ring with a red gem in it. She liked how it looked and placed it on her finger. Underneath the ring, though, she found a note.

"The Magic Ring"
"How to use it properly: Rub the gem stone in the ring and state your wish and it will come true."

Jenny scoffed at this as she looked at the ring. She decided to make a joke of it and rub the stone. She then wished...
1.title: The Magic Ring

11.content: How much younger would Jenny make herself?
11.title: Jenny's youthful look.

choices: Taller than a meter (she a giantess, at this point).
12.content: How big does Jenny get?
12.title: How big kids grow these days...

choices: Her little sister was coming downstairs, and noticed her
It was time to explore the house at this size
There was a knock at the door
It was time to go play with her girlfriend
It was time to find out what else the ring could do.
13.content:
"I wish to be smaller." Jenny spoke to the ring on her hand. But to her surprise, the thing began to glow, and next thing she knew the whole world was bursting outwards. Her clothes included.

Amid a spell of dizziness and darkness, Jenny found herself in a pile of her own clothes, merely a few inches tall.

"...huh." She muttered to no one. So it actually did work. That'll teach her for underestimating things.

While this was all well and good, it didn't stop the fact that she was now naked and tiny, not to mention out in the open. As it happened...
13.title: to be smaller

choices: Remembering the ring on her finger she wishes herself back to normal.
Rubbing the gem she wishes to stop getting bigger.
Too stunned by what was happening she does nothing until she's immobile.
14.content: Rubbing the stone Jenny opened her mouth. "I wish to be bigger." She laughed, rolling her eyes at the joke of a wish. Her laughing stopped though when she noticed the red gem starting to glow. Looking down at it she noticed her hand starting to swell. Rubbing her eyes in disbelief she saw her hands weren't the only thing swelling up. Her slim arms were starting to get flabbier. Placing her hands on her flat belly she felt it growing soft as it pushed out against her hands. Jenny began to panic as her belly pushed out into a gut. Her sundress and skirt were growing tighter as her body grew fatter by the second. Her breasts jumped up a couple cup sizes while her hips and butt filled out. As her thickening thighs started to rub against each other she put her hands up to her face. Her cheeks were puffier and she could feel a second chin starting to form. Jenny began to wonder how big she was going to get as her weight didn't appear to be slowing down.
14.title: Should have been more specific...

choices: She becomes as muscular as a female bodybuilder.
She becomes as muscular as a male bodybuilder.
141.content: Jenny rubbed the ring and wished herself back to normal. She now knew she had to be more careful with her wishes. This meant that just asking to be bigger wasn't enough. The question was what did she mean by "bigger?" She thought about it and finally got an idea. "I wish I was more muscular!" What happens next?
141.title: Remembering the ring on her finger she wishes h...

choices: Grant her more wishes per day
15.content: Jenny rubs the ring and wishes to know more about the ring and what it can do. The ring glows white and information flowed into her head. It can do anything but make you God or a Devil, it can't make somone love each other or her but it can manupilate time and space, travel dimensions, transform others and the user, create anything and everything, give powers to the user only and etc. Jenny was amazed by the many powers this ring has. A evil smile grew of her face. But something popped up, only three wishes per day.
15.title: Mysterious

choices: I want to be a boy

151.title: Transform her gender

1512.title: Nope something eals

choices: It's permanent (unless she wishes it away).
It only happens when she wishes it to be.

15121.title: The Futa form.

15122.content: Or maybe she becomes older
15122.title: Something else?

152.content: What powers did she wish for?
152.title: Give herself powers

1522.content: who does she use this power on first?
1522.title: to control people

155.content:
The ring glows white again and more information flowed into her head, sensing her thoughts on the wishing limit.
Jenny learns that the number can be changed to any number, even to infinity, but only after she has performed three wishes every day for 3 weeks. Jenny shrugs, seeing she can't do much for the rest of the day and could not think of a good wish yet, she goes back to her room after locking the door.
She throws herself on to her bed and brain storms for possible wishes. So far she only came up with three, to look sexier, to become more intellegent and to be wealthier than anyone. She scratches her head, unable to decide.
155.title: Against the rules

1551.content: You decide that Andrew Jacob Pimblett the person typing this chapter would get infinite wishes for real and that any wish that Andrew Jacob Pimblett makes would happen instantaneously and that Andrew Jacob Pimblett need only say his wishes out loud to have it granted and that Andrew Jacob Pimblett does not need to type his wishes into the story to have them come true that Andrew Jacob Pimblett need only say his wishes out loud anywhere and at any time and that after Andrew Jacob Pimblett has said his wish or wishes out loud anywhere and at any time that the wish or wishes will immediately be fulfilled and granted just the way that Andrew Jacob Pimblett wants the wish or wishes to be fulfilled and granted. You then rub the ring and Andrew Jacob Pimblett immediately gets the power that you want Andrew Jacob Pimblett to have. Andrew Jacob Pimblett gets the power and the a strong urge to use it right after he has submitted the chapter and it is possible for this to work and it does work because there is a zero point zero percent chance that it will not work, meaning that it can never not work no matter what
1551.title: Wealth

choices: Wish for a world where people can make themselves pregnant
1553.content: You decide to make yourself the smartest person on the planet, and you also decide that the person writing this will get the ability to make as many wishes as they want and have them all come true and that all they need to do to make their wishes and have them come true is to just say their wish and have it come true.
1553.title: Brains

info.brief_description: A girl is given a magical ring that'll grant all of her transforming wishes
